article_title: Poll: Majority of Americans support federally funded healthcare system
article_text:
Free Health Payer Daily Newsletter More than 38,000 health plan executives read FierceHealthPayer to stay current on trends in healthcare payment reform, cost containment strategies, the ICD-9/ICD-10 transition, fraud prevention, and more. Sign up for FREE today!

Click here to see a sample.

article_metadata.description: The majority of American adults, 58 percent, support the idea of replacing the Affordable Care Act with a federally funded system of universal coverage, according to a new Gallup poll.

og.description: The majority of American adults, 58 percent, support the idea of replacing the Affordable Care Act with a federally funded system of universal coverage, according to a new Gallup poll.
og.title: Poll: Majority of Americans support federally funded healthcare system
